Title: Requires the department of agriculture and markets to promote participation in Nourish New York program for black indigenous and people of color site controlled farms
Summary: Requires the department of agriculture and markets to promote participation in Nourish New York, including financial and technical support, for black, indigenous and people of color site controlled farms.
LawCode: Amd ยง452, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring the department of agriculture and markets to promote participation in Nourish New York program for black, indigenous and people of color site controlled farms
